title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 2200.1 - General purposes
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 2200.1 - General purposes

State Regulations

The regulations contained in this Subchapter shall apply to
all general awards, academic performance awards and fellowships administered by
the corporation, in furtherance of the purposes stated in Part 2000 of this

Title. Except as specifically provided therein, the regulations contained in

Parts 2201, 2204, 2205 and 2206 of this Title shall not apply to the health
services corps scholarships and fellowships described in Part 2212 of this

Title. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
2200.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
